sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>Error report</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

    var gr = new GlideRecord("x_snc_brewops_demo_filling_equipment");
	if(gr.get("serial_number",request.pathParams.serial_number)) {
		// can get fancier here and require some body info
		// or can just use the fault count increase as the input to kick off a maintenance flow for the builder

		gr.fault_count = gr.fault_count + 1;
		gr.update();
		
	} else {
		return new sn_ws_err.NotFoundError("Bad serial number");
	}	

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_snc_brewops_demo/equipment/{serial_number}</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/{serial_number}</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jason.mckee</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-04-02 00:20:55</sys_created_on><sys_id>1281607913e8770084a1d8228144b011</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Error report</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Glide BrewOps" source="x_snc_brewops_demo">7c2e232d13e4770084a1d8228144b04d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Glide BrewOps">7c2e232d13e4770084a1d8228144b04d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_1281607913e8770084a1d8228144b011</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jason.mckee</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-04-02 00:21:44</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Equipment">0571ec3913e8770084a1d8228144b097</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
